sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"疏忽，忽略"或"忘记"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: forget, omit, neglect, overlook, disregard, ignore
means: forget ： 普通用词，侧重某事不重要或太复杂而未能记住，也指有意疏忽或忘掉。
omit ： 指有意或无意地忘记做某事，也指删去被视作不重要、不合意的东西。
neglect ： 侧重指有意的忽略或忽视，也可指粗心与疏忽。
overlook ： 指因匆忙而疏忽或视而不见。
disregard ： 多指有意或自觉地不顾某事。
ignore ： 通常指有意不顾，或不理显而易见的事物。

sentence.Network_en: He drove with blithe disregard for the rules of the road.
sentence.Network_cn: 他开车时全然不顾交通法规。

sentence.Network_en: He showed a reckless disregard for his own safety.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对个人安危全然无所顾忌。

sentence.Network_en: a wanton disregard for human life

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... dispassionate 冷静的，平心静气的>易感应的 disregard 忽略,漠视>培育,教育 disseminate 散播>收藏，储藏.
字根字尾构词法.doc - 豆丁网 ... disquiet 不安,动摇 disregard 忽视,轻视,不理 disrobe 脱衣.
字根字尾构词法.doc - 豆丁网 ... disquiet 不安,动摇 disregard 忽视,轻视,不理 disrobe 脱衣.
[推荐]外贸常用英语[旺旺英语论坛] ... dispute 争论，质疑 n.争论 disregard 无视，不顾 dissatisfaction 不满.

list.abs: ...，即被告或者明知错误仍然坚持发表，或者对事件真相“贸然不顾”（reckless disregard）。
...真实仍发表；B、虽非明知不实，但出于不论真实与否的轻率（Reckless Disregard），二者都仍然要负法律责任。
disqualification order 取消资格令disregarded income 计算入息豁免额dissolution 解散
...听者的诠释者当然得“虚己”，用伽达默尔的话说，要“丢弃自己”（disregarding ourselves）。

entry.def: If you disregard something, you ignore it or do not take account of it.

example.ex: He disregarded the advice of his executives...
example.tran: 他对主管层的建议置若罔闻。

example.ex: Critics say he allowed the police and security forces to disregard human rights.
example.tran: 批评人士说他听任警察和安全部队漠视人权。

means.word_mean: 1. lack of attention and due care
2. willful lack of care and attention

sentences.sentence: "She cut him dead at the meeting"

means.word_mean: 3. give little or no attention to;

auth_sentence.content: There is a reason Darwinists like to disregard mathematics.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is a reason Darwinists like to disregard mathematics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is a reason Darwinists like to disregard mathematics.

auth_sentence.content: So for now I would disregard the deficit hawks.
auth_sentence.res_content: So for now I would disregard the deficit hawks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So for now I would disregard the deficit hawks.

auth_sentence.content: So, we can disregard the second statement.
auth_sentence.res_content: So, we can disregard the second statement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So, we can disregard the second statement.

means.word_mean: 不顾, 不理会, 无视

sentences.en: She completely disregarded all our objections.
sentences.cn: 她完全不理会我们的各种反对意见。

sentences.en: You can't just disregard the security problem!
sentences.cn: 你可不能忽视安全问题。

means.word_mean: 漠视, 忽视, 蔑视

sentences.en: He did it in disregard of any advice.
sentences.cn: 他不顾一切劝告做了这件事。

jushi.english: She completely disregarded all our objections.
jushi.chinese: 她完全不理会我们的各种反对意见。

jushi.english: They disregarded the notice about not walking on the grass.
jushi.chinese: 他们无视勿踏草地的告示。

jushi.english: He did it in disregard of any advice.
jushi.chinese: 他不顾一切劝告做了这件事。
